meanings.sent1: She enjoys subediting articles for the school newspaper.
meanings.sent2: The journalist spent hours subediting the breaking news story.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried subediting the dog's barking but gave up in frustration.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a skilled subediting tool, refining every word she read.
meanings.sent5: Subediting is like polishing a rough gem, making it shine for all to see.

meanings.definition: The process of editing a text for publication.
meanings.sent1: Subediting requires attention to detail and grammar skills.
meanings.sent2: The subediting of the novel was completed just in time for the book launch.
meanings.sent3: The robot's subediting of the manual was so precise it made the engineers laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the world of publishing, subediting is the unsung hero behind every great article.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with excitement as students learned about the art of subediting.
